title: JCR: The Influence of Regional Power Distributions on Interdependence
description: Paul Huth, editor of the Journal of Conflict Resolution, interviews author Michael Allen about his recent article, "The Influence of Regional Power Distributions on Interdependence."
content:encoded: Paul Huth, editor of the Journal of Conflict Resolution, interviews author Michael Allen about his recent article, "The Influence of Regional Power Distributions on Interdependence."
